posts.post_content:
Hi y'all. I haven't done some good old trading in quite some time. I am really looking for the southern leaguers that played in Texas. Bastian (San Antonio)
Molly Miller (Dallas) & Foley White (Houston). I am also working on the monster at 85 and counting. Let me know if you interested in anything. We could work a $ale, but I am much more interested in trading. All cards are listed in my profile in my For Trade Album.

T206

Breitenstein OM (one corner is nipped) TRADED
Lafitte OM (crease) TRADED
Ray Ryan Om (paper loss OF)
Hulswitt  Swt Cap (paper loss)
Dorner Pied 350 Poor
Scott, Chicago Amer Pied 350
Hayden Indy Pied 350 TRADED
Mitchell Pied 350
Street Port. Pied 350

LMK if yall want anything
Matt
Updated. The Lafitte is gone. I will put up better scans as soon as I get a pot or two of coffee in me.
Updated with the scans. 2 Trades in less than 24 hours!! Lets keep rollin'.
